test.create_query: CREATE TABLE test_table_1(id UInt64, value String) ENGINE=MergeTree ORDER BY id
CREATE TABLE test_table_2(id UInt64, value String) ENGINE=MergeTree ORDER BY id
test.fill_query: INSERT INTO test_table_1 SELECT number, number FROM numbers(5000000)
INSERT INTO test_table_2 SELECT number, number FROM numbers(5000000)
test.query: SELECT lhs.id, rhs.id, lhs.value, rhs.value FROM test_table_1 AS lhs {join_kind} JOIN test_table_2 AS rhs ON lhs.id = rhs.id WHERE lhs.id = 5 FORMAT Null
